程序包 it.polimi.ingsw.xyl.util

类 Loader

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.xyl.util.Loader
public abstract class Loader
extends java.lang.Object
Loader.java This class is responsible for loading any required assets for the game.

  • 方法详细资料

    • loadMesh

      public static javafx.scene.shape.Mesh loadMesh​(java.lang.String path)
      loadObj() Loads an OBJ file from disk and convert it to a mesh.
      参数:
      path - The file path to load the OBJ from.
      返回:
      The mesh of the selected file.

    • loadObj

      public static javafx.scene.shape.MeshView loadObj​(java.lang.String path)
      loadObj() Loads an OBJ file from disk and convert it to a mesh.
      参数:
      path - The file path to load the OBJ from.
      返回:
      The mesh of the selected file.

    • loadStl

      public static javafx.scene.shape.MeshView loadStl​(java.lang.String path)
      loadStl() Loads an STL file from disk and convert it to a mesh. NOTE: Textures do not map correctly! This is because STL files do not preserve mapping data. Source: https://stackoverflow.com/q/21997622
      参数:
      path - The file path to load the STL from.
      返回:
      The mesh of the selected file.

    • readTextFile

      public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> readTextFile​(java.lang.String path)
